location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to William Andrew Price, East India Company Agent at Bussorah [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: some of the edge of the page have been torn away, obscuring some text.

mods.abstract: The letter relays reports that meer mahana [MÄ«r Muhanna] has taken possession of a fort called Tulsea [?], twelve miles from Bushire. A request is made for a cruizer to be sent to Bushire for protection.
